he Combat sphere was a group of spells granted to clerics, crusaders, and monks that could be used to smite their foes.
Junior casters of this sphere could use
* command
* magical stone
* shillelagh
Novice divine spellcasters were able to cast
* aid
* chant
* spiritual hammer
Somewhat skilled spellcasters were able to cast
* prayer
* unearthly choir
Intermediate clerics and druids had the ability to cast
* recitation
Those with a high level of skill had access to
* flame strike
* insect plague
* righteous wrath of the faithfulThere is some confusion about the sphere to which this spell belongs. On page 175 of the Players Option Spells & Magic, where this spell is defined, it says it is a war sphere spell. However, in the appendix on page 186, it is listed in the combat sphere instead. Since the war sphere is mainly concerned with BATTLESYSTEM&trade campaigns and entire units of NPCs, it seems more likely that this spell belongs in the combat sphere.
Powerful spellcasters of such a sphere were able to cast
* spiritual wrath
* word of recall
Divine spellcasters who had mastered this sphere could cast
* holy/unholy word
